interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Despicable Me 2 Review Date: 2015/02/04 Store: Steve Carell (Actor), Kristen Wiig (Actor), Chris Renaud (Director), Pierre Coffin (Director) & 1 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Award Winners in Movies & TV, Oscar Central, Past Oscar Winners Product Description: ['Product Description', 'Gru, his adorable girls, and the mischievous Minions are back with a cast of unforgettable new characters in the blockbuster sequel to the worldwide phenomenon. Just as Gru has given up being super-bad to be a super-dad, the Anti-Villain League recruits him to track down a new criminal mastermind and save the world. Partnered with secret agent Lucy Wilde, Gru, along with the wildly unpredictable Minions, must figure out how to keep his cover while also keeping up with his duties as a father. Assemble the Minions for laugh-out-loud comedy in "one of the funniest, most enjoyable movies ever!" (MovieGuide).', 'There are multiple versions of this movie cover and each shipment is random. Customers are not guaranteed to receive a specific cover or to receive different covers with multiple purchases.', 'Amazon.com', "Sticky doesn't begin to describe Gru's new life: the ex-supervillain has given up his villainous ways and he and Dr. Nefario (Russell Brand) have settled into the legitimate business of making jellies and jams with the help of his army of minions. Parenting is no less sticky, and the fact that Gru will go to any length to ensure the happiness of his adopted girls Agnes, Edith, and Margo is evident by the elaborate birthday party he's throwing for Agnes that includes a live unicorn and a princess named Gruzinkerbell. Anti-Villain League operative Lucy Wild (Kristen Wiig) kidnaps Gru after the party, using an arsenal of spy gadgetry that would make James Bond jealous, and the agency solicits his help in apprehending a criminal who's made an entire secret lab disappear from the Arctic Circle and stolen a dangerous transmutation formula. The lure of excitement tempts Gru, and he and Lucy set up an undercover operation in a bakery in Paradise Mall, the minions start cranking out cupcakes, and Gru and Lucy begin investigating their fellow business owners. Meanwhile, Agnes pines for a mother, Margo finds her first boyfriend, Dr. Nefario takes a more exciting job, a slew of minions go missing, and Gru staunchly refuses to enter the dating scene. Little does Gru know that his whole life is about to change once again. The minions and their antics are quite funny in this second film, and, for the 10-and-under crowd, they completely steal the show. For the older crowd, the film does a decent job of further developing Gru's character and provides lots of comedic material in the exaggeration of the many challenges of parenthood as well as through the wacky exploits of the minions. (Ages 6 and older)", '--Tami Horiuchi'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Kids & Family, Animation, Comedy', 'Format': 'Animated, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Elsie Kate Fisher, Steve Carell, Nasim Pedrad, Christopher Meledandri, Pierre Coffin, Ken Jeong, Ken Daurio, Dana Gaier, Cinco Paul, Chris Renaud, Gregory Perler, Janet Healy, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove, Moises Arias, Kristen Wiig, Russell Brand, Steve CooganElsie Kate Fisher, Steve Carell, Nasim Pedrad, Christopher Meledandri, Pierre Coffin, Ken Jeong, Ken Daurio, Dana Gaier, Cinco Paul, Chris Renaud, Gregory Perler, Janet Healy, Benjamin Bratt, Miranda Cosgrove, Moises Arias, Kristen Wiig, Russell Brand, Steve Coogan See more', 'Initial release date': '2013-12-10', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Unqualified (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'D61120669D', 'Director': 'Chris Renaud, Pierre Coffin', 'Media Format': 'Animated, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 38 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 10, 2013', 'Actors': 'Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig, Benjamin Bratt, Ken Jeong, Miranda Cosgrove', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Christopher Meledandri, Janet Healy', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Cinco Paul, Ken Daurio', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Love the Minions, so this is a favorite of mine.

Carolyn G. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg) Steve McQueen (Actor), Robert Vaughn (Actor), Peter Yates (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['Bullitt (DVD) (Rpkg)', "There are bad cops and there are good cops ... and then there's Bullitt. Steve McQueen stars as Lt. Frank Bullitt in the role that made him a superstar as the hard-bitten police detective assigned to protect the star witness in a Congressional investigation. But when the witness is murdered, Bullitt mercilessly tracks a trail of lies and corruption that leads all the way to the halls of power in Washington. Steve McQueen performed his own stunts, driving the Ford Mustang in the high-speed pursuit through San Francisco that stands as one of the best and most famous car chases ever filmed.", ']]>'] {'Genre': 'Drama, Mystery & Suspense/Crime, Mystery & Suspense', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': "Norman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert VaughnNorman Fell, Robert Duvall, Don Gordon, Robert Relyea, Steve McQueen, Georg Stanford Brown, Philip D'Antoni, Felice Orlandi, Jacqueline Bisset, Carl Reindel, Peter Yates, Vic Tayback, Simon Oakland, Justin Tarr, Robert Vaughn See more", 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 1.0), English (Dolby Digital 4.0), Spanish (Mono)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '164748', 'Director': 'Peter Yates', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, Dubbed, Full Screen, NTSC, Widescreen, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 54 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 5, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve McQueen, Robert Vaughn, Jacqueline Bisset, Don Gordon, Robert Duvall', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, English, French', 'Producers': "Philip D'Antoni, Robert Relyea", 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} What can I say about Bullitt, one of the best Steve McQueen movies of all time. I know many people like his Great Escape, and so do I, but this movie has it all. Romance, intrigue and a fantastic car chase!!! Especially because it was set in San Francisco, what a place for a car chase. The next best is our modern day "Ronin", but that's a different kind of chase. It's set in Europe, where the street are super narrow. This movie, Bullit, is a great cop movie also. So if by chance you've missed it, it needs to go on your must see list.
Carolyn Gleeson- Lover of Steve McQueen movies in any form. In fact if you like Steve, see his motorcycle documentary,"On any Sunday". Unbelievable!!! Bullitt- must see for car buffs! Luminarias Evelina Fernandez (Actor), Scott Bakula (Actor), Jose Luis Valenzuela (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Comedy {} This is one of my favorite movies. Sort of like a Latina, "Waiting to Exhale". I love the characters and how they explore every facet, whether it's real or a myth about the way people perceive each other. It is funny, poignant and serious all at the same time. And the music is fabulous, the best soundtrack ever. This is a great rainy day movie and one that you will watch over and over again.
Carolyn G Luminarias-movie On Any Sunday - Re-Mastered-Director's Special Edition 2 Disc Set Bruce Brown (Actor, Director), Mert Lawwill (Actor) Rated: G Format: DVD Movies & TV, Fully Loaded DVDs, Special Editions ['Featuring Steve McQueen with music by the famed Dominick Fronteirie, this film is without a doubt the quintessential motorcycle film, now digitally remastered and loaded with never-before-seen extras.'] {'Genre': 'Sports', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Special Edition', 'Contributor': 'Bruce Brown, Malcolm Smith, Mert Lawwill, Steve McQueen', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 28 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.33:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'G (General Audience)', 'Item model number': 'Relay Time: 88 min; 2Videos', 'Director': 'Bruce Brown', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Closed-captioned, Color, NTSC, Special Edition', 'Run time': '1 hour and 28 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2007', 'Actors': 'Bruce Brown, Mert Lawwill, Malcolm Smith, Steve McQueen', 'Studio': 'Monterey Video', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Probably the great motorcycle movie every made. I love all the other Bruce Brown movies, the ones about surfing around the world. He's an incredible person and hits the pulse of motocycle riding with this film. On any Sunday-Motorcyle movie extraordinare!!! 47 Ronin Keanu Reeves (Actor), Hiroyuki Sanada (Actor), Carl Rinsch (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG-13 Format: DVD Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Action & Adventure ['Keanu Reeves stars in the action-adventure epic, 47 Ronin. After a treacherous warlord kills their master and banishes their kind, 47 leaderless samurai vow to seek vengeance and reclaim their honor. This band of ronin must seek help from Kai (Reeves)—an enslaved half-breed they once rejected—in their ultimate fight for redemption in a savage world of mythic and wondrous terrors. Kai becomes their most deadly weapon and the heroic inspiration for these outnumbered warriors to confront their enemy and seize eternity.', 'Bonus Content:', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Deleted Scenes', 'Re-forging the Legend', 'Re-forging the Legend', ']]>'] {'Genre': 'revenge movie, movie night, buy movie, DVD movie, Blu-ray movie, fantasy movie, samurai movie, 4K movie, digital movie, Action & Adventure, rent movie, action movie, adventure movierevenge movie, movie night, buy movie, DVD movie, Blu-ray movie, fantasy movie, samurai movie, 4K movie, digital movie, Action & Adventure, rent movie, action movie, adventure movie See more', 'Format': 'Color, Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Contributor': 'Ko Shibasaki, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Hiroyuki Sanada, Min Tanaka, Pamela Abdy, Keanu Reeves, Tadanobu Asano, Carl Rinsch, Hossein Amini, Rinko Kikuchi, Eric McLeod, Chris MorganKo Shibasaki, Cary-Hiroyuki Tagawa, Hiroyuki Sanada, Min Tanaka, Pamela Abdy, Keanu Reeves, Tadanobu Asano, Carl Rinsch, Hossein Amini, Rinko Kikuchi, Eric McLeod, Chris Morgan See more', 'Initial release date': '2014-04-01', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1), Spanish (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.40:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.47 Ounces', 'Item model number': '29093346', 'Director': 'Carl Rinsch', 'Media Format': 'Color, Multiple Formats, Widescreen, NTSC', 'Run time': '1 hour and 59 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 1, 2014', 'Actors': 'Keanu Reeves, Hiroyuki Sanada, Tadanobu Asano, Rinko Kikuchi, Ko Shibasaki', 'Subtitles': 'Spanish, French', 'Producers': 'Pamela Abdy, Eric McLeod', 'Studio': 'Universal Pictures Home Entertainment', 'Writers': 'Chris Morgan, Hossein Amini', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'} 47 Ronin wonderful movie, a bit of history, a bit of Sci fi, fantasy and a real spectacle. Really enjoyed it.

profile:
The user is a passionate film enthusiast with a strong preference for classic action and adventure films, particularly those featuring iconic actors like Steve McQueen. They admire character-driven narratives that intertwine romance, intrigue, and thrilling car chases, gravitating towards high production values, notable stunt work, and well-crafted suspense in captivating locales.

Recent interactions have revealed an expanding appreciation for compelling comedies that explore rich character dynamics and blend humor with poignant themes. Their interest now extends into sports cinema, demonstrating openness to both classic and contemporary titles and valuing original works while also embracing fresh interpretations. 

The user’s latest engagement reflects a love for animated comedies that combine humor and family dynamics, highlighting their fondness for films with memorable characters and comedic elements. They have shown a continued interest in engaging narratives that offer depth while providing entertainment, successfully bridging a range of genres. 

Overall, the user embodies a well-rounded film lover, seeking diverse storytelling experiences across genres while maintaining particular affection for captivating adventures featuring iconic figures and classic storytelling styles, now including animated features that appeal to both their comedic sensibilities and their love for character-rich narratives.
